name: Tint
headline: Makes it easy for tech platforms to embed insurance into products
description:
Tint makes it easy for tech platforms to embed insurance into their products. For example, when you go to Outdoorsy to rent an RV, the insurance that is sold with the rental is powered by our technology.

Our product provides anything that is needed from underwriting software to access to insurers to compliance, in a simple API.

founders.name: Matheus Riolfi, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO of Tint. Before this, he was the Director of International Expansion at Turo and launched the company in Canada, UK, and Germany. He pioneered the operations, including designing risk management in different stages of the company and sourcing insurance in various countries. He is a licensed insurance broker, holds an MBA from Harvard Business school and a dual degree in business from University of São Paulo and Kedge Business School.

founders.name: Jérôme Selles, Founder
founders.description: Jérôme co-founded Tint.ai, an API-based and AI-powered platform for embedded insurance. Before Tint.ai, he was the head of Data at Turo. He holds a MSc. in Applied Mathematics from ENSTA ParisTech and MSc. in Telecommunications from UPC BarcelonaTech.

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Tint**

**Mission:** Tint aims to revolutionize the insurance landscape by making it effortless for tech platforms to embed insurance directly into their offerings. If you've ever rented an RV through Outdoorsy, for instance, the insurance associated with that rental was made possible through Tint’s innovative technology.

**What They Do:** At its core, Tint provides a comprehensive suite of tools ranging from underwriting software and access to insurers to compliance, all delivered through a straightforward API. This enables companies to offer embedded insurance solutions seamlessly, enhancing the user experience during transactions.

**Foundation and Growth:** Founded in 2018 and a proud member of Y Combinator Batch W21, Tint operates out of San Francisco and has grown to a dedicated team of 40 employees. Harj Taggar serves as their Group Partner, helping steer their mission forward.

**Key Features:**
- **Embedded Insurance Solutions:** Tint integrates insurance directly into SaaS platforms and marketplaces, transforming it from an optional add-on to a core feature. This approach not only increases user engagement but also drives higher conversion rates.
- **Industry Applications:** Tint's solutions cater to various sectors, including transportation & logistics, property management, mobility, and bespoke insurance solutions. Their API allows businesses across these industries to offer tailored, white-labeled insurance options that elevate their service offerings.
- **Revenue Growth Potential:** By embedding insurance, businesses can effectively tap into new revenue streams and provide customers with the protection they genuinely want—making insurance a desirable feature rather than a burdensome afterthought.

**Why It Stands Out:** Unlike typical insurance firms, Tint focuses on making insurance a natural part of the customer journey, which helps in building brand trust and loyalty. Whether you're a startup or an established enterprise, Tint provides the infrastructure to help you deliver insurance in a way that feels inherent to your service.

**Website:** [tint.ai](http://www.tint.ai)

In essence, Tint isn't just about insurance; it's about embedding trust and protection into the very fabric of the digital experience, setting up both customers and businesses for success.
